subject: Re: Thank you for your recent refinance debt request, we are ready to lend money
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE ready money to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this offer will expire THIS EVENING):
$376,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this easy form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
http://skelaenyard.com/
